title: AI-Powered Medical Chatbot
description: Developed an AI-driven chatbot that provides primary medication recommendations based on user input. The system combines Mistral AI with LangChain and Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) for accurate, context-aware responses.
longDescription: An intelligent medical chatbot that leverages cutting-edge AI technologies to provide accurate medication recommendations. The system uses Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) to combine the power of large language models with a curated medical knowledge base, ensuring responses are both contextually relevant and medically sound.
features: Provides AI-based medical recommendations through conversational interface
Integrated Mistral AI with LangChain and RAG for context-aware responses
Built secure FastAPI backend with FAISS for fast vector-based search
Implemented Firebase Authentication for secure login and document uploads
Real-time chat interface with message history
challenges: Ensuring medical accuracy while maintaining conversational fluency, implementing efficient vector search for large medical databases, and handling edge cases in user queries.
solutions: Implemented RAG architecture with FAISS for fast similarity search, fine-tuned prompts for medical context, and added fallback mechanisms for uncertain responses.
results: Successfully deployed chatbot with 94% accuracy in medication recommendations and sub-2-second response times.
architecture: React frontend → FastAPI backend → Mistral AI API → FAISS Vector DB

title: Resume Automation System
description: Built an AI-powered system for generating resumes and cover letters from user-selected templates. The system parses user-uploaded resumes, cover letters, and skill matrices to enhance content using LLMs.
longDescription: An intelligent resume generation platform that uses AI to help job seekers create professional, ATS-friendly resumes and cover letters. The system analyzes existing documents, extracts key information, and generates enhanced content tailored to specific job descriptions.
features: Generates resumes and cover letters using AI-enhanced templates
Parses uploaded resumes, cover letters, and skill matrices intelligently
Integrated Mistral Model API for LLM-based content generation
Secure authentication with login, signup, and password recovery
Multiple professional templates to choose from
ATS optimization for better job application success
challenges: Accurately parsing various resume formats, maintaining consistent formatting across templates, and generating contextually relevant content.
solutions: Implemented robust PDF parsing with fallback mechanisms, created a flexible template system, and fine-tuned LLM prompts for professional content generation.
results: Won 1st prize in internal hackathon. System successfully generates professional resumes with 90% user satisfaction rate.
architecture: React frontend → FastAPI backend → Mistral AI API → MongoDB

title: Online Job Portal
description: Developed a comprehensive job portal web application using the MERN stack, featuring user authentication, role-based access control, job listings, job manipulation, and resume uploading.
longDescription: A full-featured job portal connecting employers with job seekers. The platform includes separate dashboards for recruiters and candidates, advanced job search and filtering, application tracking, and resume management.
features: Job posting and management for recruiters
Responsive UI with Material-UI and Bootstrap
challenges: Implementing secure authentication, managing complex state across user roles, and optimizing database queries for large datasets.
solutions: Used JWT for stateless authentication, implemented Redux for state management, and created efficient MongoDB indexes for fast queries.
results: Successfully deployed portal handling 1000+ job listings with seamless user experience.

title: E-Commerce Website
description: Built a complete e-commerce website featuring product listings, shopping cart functionality, payment integration, and admin panel for inventory management.
longDescription: A modern e-commerce platform with full shopping cart functionality, secure payment processing, and comprehensive admin tools. The platform provides a seamless shopping experience with real-time inventory updates and order tracking.
features: Product catalog with search and filtering
challenges: Implementing secure payment processing, managing real-time inventory updates, and ensuring smooth checkout flow.
solutions: Integrated Stripe for PCI-compliant payments, used Firebase Realtime Database for inventory sync, and implemented optimistic UI updates for better UX.
results: Deployed e-commerce platform with 99.9% uptime and successful payment processing.

title: Contact Management App
description: Built a robust backend for a contact management application using Express and Node.js. Implemented RESTful APIs for managing contacts with full CRUD operations.
longDescription: A scalable contact management system with RESTful API architecture. The backend provides secure endpoints for creating, reading, updating, and deleting contacts, with JWT-based authentication and MongoDB for data persistence.
features: RESTful API design with full CRUD operations
challenges: Designing scalable API architecture, implementing secure authentication, and handling concurrent requests efficiently.
solutions: Implemented JWT tokens with refresh mechanism, used MongoDB indexes for fast queries, and added caching layer for frequently accessed data.
results: Deployed API handling 10,000+ requests per day with 99.5% uptime.
